name: Together (itch) (Will Saymon)
description:
This is a simple game developed for Mini Jam 30. Join with your best friend in a local party game where your mission is survive!

The two players share the stamina bar and... share the same attack button!

Keep moving to recovery stamina in less time!

Controlls:

Player 01: w/a/s/d  move

Player 02: i/j/k/l move

Attack: Space
